text: As the Reith Committee foresaw 'perfect synchronisation of the movement of employing firms with the movement of employed people is not practicable' - For short periods over the years some of the London new town corporations have been able to offer a house or a flat at once to anyone eligible for one, but in the main house building has lagged behind the demand.
